title: Interpretation of a dream about little ducks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about small ducks in a dream: Animals when we dream certainly have an interpretation or they symbolize a specific thing, and from here we will learn about these interpretations today. You may also know a lion in a dream. We will tell you the interpretation of a dream about eating small ducks, as well as black and white ducks, so you can find it in our article All the dreams you have about little ducks, follow us to get started. You may also be interested in: Airplane in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about little ducks in a dreamDucks in a dream are a good sign for the dreamer, and it also indicates the abundance of nutrition that he will receive. And when this dream is for someone who is not working, it It is considered good news for a new job that fulfills his needs. Likewise, if a prisoner dreams of little ducks, this is a sign that he will soon be released and freedom will return to his soul. Ibn Sirin said that the good in a dream about a duck is seeing it, but while the dreamer only hears its voice, he may This indicates some problems that the dreamer will face. It was also believed that small ducks in a man’s dream are a sign of marriage to a fair and loyal girl. You may be interested in: The girl in the dreamInterpretation of a dream about small white ducksColors in a dream are considered a certain indicator of something, and when he sees Dreaming of white ducks, there is definitely a message. Let us discover its interpretation as follows: The white duck in a dream indicates good news that the dreamer will hear. It also indicates that the person has received a blessing from God Almighty in his money and livelihood. This is if the duck is small in size, while its large size in the dream is considered a sign of approaching success. The white color in general is a color that indicates peace and kindness. And to see in a dream a large number of ducks and their color is black, this is a sign of money and great power. Interpretation of a dream about small ducks in a dream. Interpretation of the death of ducks in a dream. A small dead animal may bother the dreamer. Let us know what that means in a dream. The opinion of jurists and commentators is as follows: A dead duck in a dream indicates loss, money, work, or study. Likewise, if a single or married girl sees a dream, it means failure in life or marriage. It is necessary to strive to achieve success. It may indicate The death of a person very close to God. You may be interested: Crying and oppression in a dream. What is the interpretation of eating small ducks in a dream? In this paragraph, we will discuss the interpretation of the dream of eating small ducks, which is as follows: Many jurists and interpretive scholars have agreed that if a dream sees itself eating ducks, this is a sign. Good. It indicates getting money or getting a good job. For a married woman, eating duck in her dream is good news for pregnancy and happiness in married life. But eating raw duck is evidence of the dreamer’s misbehavior, and that it leads people astray and must be controlled. Himself before God Almighty punishes him. For an unmarried girl, eating ducks in a dream is a close marriage or inheritance from one of her relatives. You may be interested in: Seeing house and room furniture in a dream. Interpretation of seeing small ducks in one dream. Ibn Sirin mentioned that...

title: Sex in a dream and the interpretation of sex in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Sex in a dream by Ibn Sirin Scientific research has proven that there are about 8% of visions in both men and women, including sexual dreams. It is also noted that it is difficult for a person not to remember this dream after waking up from sleep, as happens in the rest of the dreams. This is how we will quote in our article. This is the interpretation Sex in a dream.Interpretation of sex in a dreamHaving sex in a dream has many interpretations associated with it, which vary depending on the person who sees this dream. If you see that you are having sex in a public place, this means that the dreamer does not have any kind of privacy in his life, and there are many people who interfere in the details of his daily life and even interfere a lot in his life. Overall.Interpretation of a dream about having sex with a girl: Ibn Sirin says that this vision is good news for its owner. Because having sex with a girl in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s high status in his work and his obtaining promotions that help him achieve his ambitions, and it is a promising vision for the dreamer. I dreamed that I had sex with my sister. This vision is disturbing, but its interpretation is very reassuring. Whoever sees in his dream among men that he is sleeping with his sister, this indicates that he is the protector and defender of his sister in reality, and that he is in control of her actions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. What if I dreamed that I had sex with a married man? The interpretation of this dream varies depending on the dreamer’s condition in reality. As we will explain: If the dreamer is married and sees that he is having sex with someone other than his wife, this may be evidence of his dissatisfaction with the relationship that he has with his life partner in reality. But if the dreamer is happy in his life and satisfied with it, this dream may just be A fleeting fantasy inspired by this dreamer only. The interpretation of dreams about sex in its various states may frighten the dreamer as an unpleasant vision, but these visions, according to the interpretation of the imams of interpretation, are praiseworthy visions and there is no need to worry about them: This type of dream can indicate this high status But in a dream about sex, it can be canceled if this dream leads to wetness in the dream, and therefore it is necessary to wash and purify in reality, but the dream is a dream. The body between a man and a man may indicate that they are together in something. There are also some interpretations of sex in a dream that indicate the extent of communication and sympathy between the two parties in the dream, unless the dream refers to other actions. Having sex in a dream. Seeing sex in a dream varies from One person to another depending on the situation the dreamer sees. We find many examples of this vision, including: If a man or young man sees in his dream that he is having intercourse with a dead woman whom he does not know, this means that he will get a lot of food, which he will bless - God willing - and it is good. Vision. If a man sees in a dream that he is marrying a woman of bad character, this indicates that he is fighting for the world and requires some prohibitions to win by any means. If the wife sees in her dream that she is having sex with her husband while she is menstruating, this means that her husband’s money is forbidden, and she must Caution, an unpleasant vision. In a dream about sex

title: Interpretation of Eid in a dream

preview.html: Although jurists unanimously agree that the interpretation of Eid in a dream often refers to the good and great happiness that will be achieved in reality. However, psychologists and sociologists reported that seeing Eid in a dream is a dream that reflects the extent of loneliness that the dreamer feels in reality, as well as his urgent need for joy and happiness. And perhaps they are right in their interpretation, because Eid is one of the best occasions that give the soul a sense of joy and happiness. , Follow us. Interpretation of Eid in a dream Eid in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirms that seeing Eid in a dream is often a sign of goodness and joy in the dreamer's life, because Eid always gives one a feeling of happiness and joy. He adds that this dream sometimes portends the end of the worries and concerns that have accumulated on him in the past, as well as the repayment of debts, God willing. In some cases, seeing a celebration in a dream is a sign of the dreamer's success in his life, whether at the level of work, or even study, as well as in social life. As for seeing Eid al-Adha, it does not look good, it is a sign to the fortuneteller that he will be exposed to many worries and problems in the current period, but he must be patient and seek God's help in that. Because soon God will complete it. Interpretation of Eid in a dream by Al-Nabulsi For his part, Imam Muhammad Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing Eid in a dream is always a sign of goodness, because it brings joy and pleasure to the dreamer, and thus it is a sign of the collapse of worries and worries from the shoulders. And it shows his ability to achieve the dreams and ambitions he dreamed of on the ground. Sometimes seeing the Eid is good news of repentance and returning to Almighty God and staying away from the sins and transgressions that the dreamer has already committed. According to Al-Nabulsi's interpretation, the prisoner who sees the Eid and celebrates it in a dream, his dream is a sign of his release from prison and his liberation from captivity, and God knows best. Congratulating on the Eid is a sign of hearing a lot of good news, whether the fortune teller is the one who congratulates him on the Eid, or the one who congratulates him on his arrival. Ibn Shaheen's interpretation of seeing the Eid in a dream Ibn Shaheen's interpretation does not differ from what Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi narrated. Seeing it in a dream is a sign of goodness, blessing and happiness in the dreamer's life, but this happens in the event that it is one of the well-known religious holidays. If the dreamer finds that he is celebrating a holiday that he does not know what it is, then this is a sign of deception and heresy, and it may be a sign of the proximity of the situation or dismissal from work, and God is ready. Eid in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi stated that seeing Eid in a dream is one of the dreams that the dreamer should rejoice in and be happy to see. This is because it is a sign of happiness and an exit from the worries and sorrows that were accumulating on him in reality. In some cases, seeing Eid is news of the happy news that he will receive in the dream, which will make him very happy. Interpretation of the dream of Eid for a single woman Jurists unanimously agree that Eid and all its manifestations are a sign of happiness and stability in which the situation lives

This is because it is a sign of happiness and a release from the worries and sorrows that were accumulating on him in reality. In some cases, the vision of Eid is news of the happy news that he will receive in the dream, which will make him very happy. Interpretation of the dream of Eid for a single woman. Jurists agree Unanimously, the Eid and all its manifestations are a sign of happiness and stability in which people live

title: Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ankabut in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ankabut in a dream Surat Al-Ankabut is one of the Meccan surahs of the Holy Qur’an that was revealed in Mecca. And repentance from sins. This Surah is Surah No. 29 in the Holy Qur’an, and when you see this Surah, it is in a person’s dream. People are looking for a sure interpretation of this dream in order to reassure the person that this dream is a good vision. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surah Al-Ankabut in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees or hears Surat Al-Ankabut in her dream, this indicates that she is an unmarried girl. That this woman will be happy. The girl will be blessed with success and distinction in her upcoming academic and professional life. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream or also listening to Surat Al-Ankabut, and this happens. This indicates that this girl enjoys good company and loyal friends around her who truly love her. Thus, the interpretation of seeing or hearing a girl in her dream Surat Al-Ankabut is read over a dead person. This girl is living in a time of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ankabut in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees or hears Surat Al-Ankabut in her dream, this is evidence. May this woman obtain good and sufficient sustenance from God. The Almighty. This is because she wants to do many good deeds that bring her closer to God Almighty. If a married woman hears Surat Al-Ankabut in her dream, this indicates that, and this is evidence that this woman was able to overcome a period of disagreements and problems between her and her husband. But seeing a married woman in Her dream is that she is reading Surat Al-Ankabut with one of her husband’s friends. This is evidence that this woman is evil. Why is this woman cheating on her husband? Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ankabut in a dream for a pregnant woman: When you see or hear a pregnant woman in a dream, this means that this woman is about to give birth. Likewise, seeing a pregnant woman in her dream reading Surat Al-Ankabut, this is evidence that this woman She will give birth to her child easily. When a pregnant woman hears Surah Al-Ankabut in her dream, this indicates that this woman will give birth to a boy. Just as a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is reading a Surah. Al-Ankabut indicates the collapse of some disputes between her and her husband. Likewise, when a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is reading a Surah. Spider: This indicates that her husband will find a new job. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Ankabut in a dream for a divorced woman. If a woman sees or hears Surat Al-Ankabut in her dream, this is evidence. However, this woman will be able to overcome many differences and problems. As you can see or A divorced woman hears Surat Al-Ankabut in a dream. It indicates the beginning of a new life for this woman, better than the life she was living with her previous husband. In addition to hearing a divorced woman in her dream refers to Surat Al-Ankabut. This woman will soon obtain a lot of sustenance and goodness. Interpretation of the vision Or hearing Surah Al-Ankabut in a dream for a man. Seeing a traveler or hearing Surah Al-Ankabut in a dream in a dream indicates that this man will soon marry a girl who has many good and righteous qualities. Likewise, seeing a married man

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a baby boy in a dream: Is it good or bad to see a baby boy? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about a male infant? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a male infant for unmarried people, married people, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin and interpretation scholars. Seeing a male infant in a dream Scientists interpret a dream about a baby as evidence that the dreamer will soon enter a new phase of his life, in which he will be happy and fulfilled. If the person carrying the pregnancy is married and his partner has not given birth before, and he sees a child in his dream, this indicates that he will become pregnant soon and that the Lord (Glory be to Him) is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a smiling child in his dream, this means that he will alleviate his anxiety and rid him of problems and worries. Which was preoccupying him in the previous period. Commentators said that a dream about a child means that he will hear good news in the near future, and if the dreamer sees an infant and a breastfeeding bottle in his dream, this means that he will soon become wealthy and free from poverty and hardship. For the dreamer who suffered, the infant in the vision symbolizes progress in work and reaching administrative positions, but after fatigue and diligence. Seeing an infant in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a male child as an indication of the great change that will happen to the dreamer soon, and if the dreamer is not married, then the infant In his dream, it symbolizes his imminent marriage to a beautiful girl who falls in love. With her at first sight and he spends many pleasant moments with her, and if the dreamer faces problems with his colleagues and sees the child in his sleep, this will end soon. If the dreamer is living a love story at the present time and sees his girlfriend carrying a male child, this means that he will propose to her soon and the situation will be eased. Their difficult affairs, and if the dreamer sees the infant walking, this indicates that he will do so. He soon reaches his goals and ambitions that he sought to achieve. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman. Scientists have interpreted the dream of a single infant. Once he achieves his dreams and is proud of himself because he did not give up or give up, and if the dreamer loves a current person and sees an infant, this symbolizes that you will marry this person soon and you will never regret making this decision, and it was said that an infant in a dream indicates that the dreamer has many Friends who bring with them all love and respect. Interpreters said that an unmarried girl who sees more than one child in her dream will soon attend a pleasant occasion for one of her family members. Seeing a male child in your arms is for singles. Scientists interpret seeing a child in the arms of an unmarried woman as a sign that the Lord (Glory be to Him) He will answer her prayers soon. Seeing a handsome male child in a dream for an unmarried woman. Commentators said that a beautiful male child in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes repentance from sins or wisdom and correct behavior in some matters. A young girl in a dream for an unmarried woman

Commentators said that a beautiful male child in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes repentance from sins or wisdom and correct behavior in some matters. A young girl in a dream for an unmarried woman

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing miserliness in a dream?

preview.html: The Hadot website offers you an interpretation of dreams about miserliness and miserliness – which are characteristics of some people, and these are among the things that people do not like. Knowing the miserable person in a dream is complete, like us. We have collected for you the interpretation of sleep about stinginess for poor women, married women, and pregnant women, as well as for men, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. You are interested in knowing the interpretation of stinginess for poor, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. ...Why was Ibn Sirin’s greed found in Kamel’s dream? The scholar Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of stinginess in a dream completely, as an indication of stinginess, gossip, and addressing others in an inappropriate way. In addition, the dreamer who sees himself carrying someone close is one of the visions Which indicates that the dreamer is actually a bad-tempered person. Likewise, stinginess in a dream shows the dreamer’s greed, his great love for money, and his desire to save a lot of money. Why does Al-Nabulsi dream of being stingy? Al-Nabulsi explained that greed in a dream indicates the illness that the dreamer suffers from and his lack of... His ability to overcome it. Seeing miserliness in a dream shows the bad qualities that characterize the dreamer and indicates inappropriate actions. Spending money in the dream is complete and the dreamer does not want to spend it, as it speaks of the approaching of his time, and this is one of the unwanted visions. Why do single women dream of miserliness? Interpretation Complete for a single woman seeing a miserable person in a dream means that she will accumulate a lot of money and knowledge in her next life. Also, complete nonsense in a woman’s dream is evidence of spiritual life and a feeling of great need for love and intimacy. Seeing sitting with a miser in a complete dream speaks of a girl’s failure in The life that she lives, whether it is in relationships, study, or work. Why does a married woman dream of being stingy? Seeing a married woman being stingy in a dream is complete evidence of an illness that has befallen her and for which there is no cure. Seeing a miserable, complete husband in a dream means that she feels uncomfortable with her husband and lacks To what you need in a marital relationship. Why dream of a pregnant stingy woman? Seeing a pregnant woman stingy in a complete dream means that she feels tired and stressed due to childbirth and her intense fear of losing the fetus. In addition, seeing a pregnant woman spending money and being happy means an easy and affordable birth, As well as receiving a living wage and goodness. If you have a dream and want it interpreted, leave it in a comment below and a team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream is one of the visions that cause anxiety and terror in the souls of women, and many do not know the true interpretation of this dream and whether it causes fear or is it a symbol of pleasure or reassurance. A dream according to the dreamer’s condition itself and the state in which she saw the blood, the dream is corrupt, as is rumored in inheritance, only by the presence of blood in it. Therefore, during our article today, we will explain the dream of menstruation in a dream in detail for single, married, and pregnant women, and the symbolism of menstrual blood in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq in the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dreamInterpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream by Imam al-SadiqImam al-Sadiq says: Menstrual blood in a dream symbolizes the sins committed by the dreamer, and if she sees herself bathing or bathing in it, it is like repentance and purification from sins and transgressions.Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, as for the scholar Ibn Sirin, he disagreed with Imam al-Sadiq about seeing menstruation in a dream, as Ibn Sirin was admonishing the dreamer about the abundant goodness that will come to the dreamer in reality. Since menstruation is quantities of useless spoiled blood, and even its imprisonment harms the woman and causes her death, then its occurrence In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer will be freed from her problems and will be dominated by serious concerns, and there is a tinge in that. Bay of Sorrows. Menstruation in the dreamer’s dream is a sign that she has achieved her goals and aspirations that she desperately wants and desires. If the dreamer’s menstrual blood is red in color, this is a sign of the abundance of good and ample nutrition and the great gains that she will achieve in her life. As for black blood, there is no good in it at all. But it indicates great sorrows, worries, and problems in the life of the visionary. Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream for a single woman: Many girls feel anxious and afraid because of the menstrual cycle, its time, and its regularity. Therefore, we find that the dream of an unmarried girl who worries about her role in her sleep is normal and has no explanation. However, if the girl who has not yet married does not take into account menstruation and does not care about it, then this is a sign of the abundance of goodness coming her way, and it is a sign for the single woman that her marriage is approaching. While Al-Nabulsi sees the opposite, he sees that menstrual blood in a dream for one girl is evidence that she She has committed many sins that displease God. Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees menstrual blood in her dream, this is evidence of the husband’s abundant and generous kindness. If the woman is married and does not have children, this is a sign that God will give birth to her soon, God willing. If the color of menstrual blood in a married woman’s dream is black, this indicates severe marital disputes and disputes that may lead to divorce. Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream for a pregnant woman: One of the nightmares that every pregnant woman has is seeing menstrual blood in her dream because it makes her feel fear and panic for her fetus and it increases. Her fear if she is in the first months of pregnancy, but commentators have agreed on the signs of menstruation for a pregnant woman as follows: If a pregnant woman sees menstrual blood in her dream, this is evidence of an easy birth.

title: Interpretation of a dream about whales in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing whales in a dream. It is one of the visions that many people have, and it has meanings and meanings that vary according to the details of the dream and according to the dreamer, whether it is a woman, a man, or a single girl. Like seeing whales in a dream, it varies between bad and good. You may also know the dead father in the dream. We will try to find Some details to explain seeing whales in a dream from the most prominent sheikhs of dream interpretation in the Arab world, such as Ibn Sirin, in order to give the reader an indication of this dream, but without concluding what. It will be presented, even if there is a match between the reader’s vision and the dream he is dreaming of, we will present it and its interpretation, because dream interpretation scholars are a conclusion that explains the vision of another vision.Interpretation of seeing whales in a dreamIbn SirinIf one sees a whale in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems That is presented to a person, which is often related to his field of work. Interpretation of seeing whales in a dream by Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a whale in a dream means that the dreamer is suffering from loneliness, distress, distress, and sadness. Interpretation of seeing whales in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Seeing a whale in a dream has many different meanings, so if you You dream that you are hunting a whale, then this vision shows that those around you are taking advantage of you. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing whales in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing whales in a dream. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing whales in a dream can be an indication of problems and crises that The dreamer suffers from it, and most of it is related to the field of work, and God knows best. Also, if you dream of driving and controlling whales, this may be a sign of the high position in which the dreamer works, which gives him great power. As for seeing a whale sleeping on the dreamer’s bed, this indicates sadness and anxiety that The dreamer suffers from it. In general, whales in a dream express the intense fear and anxiety that the present suffers about the future, and God knows best. Read also: Penguin in a dreamSeeing whales in a dream for NabulsiImam Nabulsi believes that a dream about a whale can be an indication of the anguish and loneliness that the dreamer is suffering from Also, seeing the death of a whale may be an indication of the good news that the dreamer will hear during the coming period - God willing. Al-Nabulsi also says that riding whales in a dream and swimming with them quickly could be good news for the dreamer that he will be able to achieve success, God willing. If The dreamer works in trade, so a dream about a whale could be good news for achieving a lot of profit - God willing. Professional. When you ride the black milk whale and control it, this may indicate the strong power that the dreamer has and the ability to control all matters, and this dream may also be an indication that the present will gain a great position in society, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing fire in a dream is one of the dreams that many people ask about its interpretation because it causes some fear and discomfort after waking up from sleep. Different interpretations from single and married people, divorced people and others for this reason, in this article today, Together we will learn about the interpretation of seeing fire in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of dreams of seeing fire in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the girl When the dreamer sees fire in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer will get married in the same year in which he saw Vision. Also, when the dreamer sees a fire and something hits her in a dream, and she is an unmarried girl, this may mean that the dreamer is approaching her wedding date. When the dreamer sees a fire in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer will communicate with someone He has a passion for it. Also, when the dreamer sees fire in a dream and she is an unmarried girl, this may indicate that the dreamer will marry after a love story. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fire in a dream for a married woman When the dreamer sees fire in a dream and gets married, this may mean that the dreamer Will be pregnant soon. Also, when the dreamer sees a fire in a dream and she is a married woman, this may indicate that the dreamer will face problems with her husband if the fire burns intensely. When the dreamer sees a fire in a dream and she is a married woman, this may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to injury. In case of fire. Also, when the dreamer sees a fire in a dream and she is a married woman, this may indicate that the dreamer will bring her a great source of livelihood if it does not cause a fire. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fire in a dream for a pregnant woman When the dreamer sees a fire in a dream during Pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will achieve good things in her life. Also, when the dreamer sees a fire in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will enjoy good luck in the coming period. • When the dreamer sees a fire in a dream during pregnancy, this may indicate that the dreamer will give birth to a baby girl. Also, when the dreamer saw a fire in a dream and was pregnant, this may indicate that the dreamer will give birth to a male child. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fire in a dream for a man: When the dreamer sees a fire burning, and people go to it in a dream, this may indicate that The dreamer will achieve goodness and blessings for himself and these people. Also, when the dreamer sees a fire lighting up, and goes to enjoy it in the dream, this may mean that the dreamer will forget his loneliness and loneliness.• When the dreamer sees a fire in a dream, and it was daytime, and it had a sound and tongues of flame, this may indicate that The dreamer will witness a war in his homeland. Also, when the dreamer sees a fire in a dream and dies during the day, but there is no flame or sound in it, this may indicate that the dreamer is afflicted with an illness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fire

title: Interpretation of seeing water falling on a wall in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing water coming down the wall in a dream by Ibn Sirin The science of interpreting dreams and visions is one of the sciences in which many Muslim scholars excelled, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Sadiq, Abu Ali, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and others. From the verses of the Holy Qur’an and the Sunnah of the Prophet, in this article we will learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of water coming down from the wall in a dream. Interpretation of seeing water coming down the wall in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing water coming down from the wall has many benefits mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in the Almighty’s saying: (And We made from water every living thing). The interpretation of seeing water falling from the wall in a dream, including Ibn Sirin, came as follows: Interpretation of seeing water coming down from the wall To see clear water falling in a dream means a lot of sustenance and enormous wealth that the dreamer must enjoy. In addition, if the dreamer sees dirty, impure water coming down from the wall of the house, this is evidence that the dreamer and his family have committed sins and transgressions, and this vision is also evidence of not performing prayers. But when the dreamer sees in a dream that water is coming down from the wall of the house, this is a sign and an indication that he has some worries, problems and sorrows that will disturb him and control the owner of the house. As for the unmarried girl who sees in her dream that water is coming down from the wall of her house, this indicates her close marriage to a righteous and pious man with whom she lives happily. As for if the divorced woman sees water coming down from the wall, this is evidence of getting rid of the pain, sadness and problems she faces. See also: Interpretation of a dream about giving a ring to a single and married man by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about water on the floor of the house in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing water coming down from the wall Imam Ibn Sirin excelled in the science of dream interpretation and has many books and books in interpreting the different dreams that the dreamer sees as interpretations of the dreams of the Imam himself. The vision differed according to the circumstances surrounding the visionary, whether she was married, divorced, pregnant or single, so Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing water coming down from the wall in a dream is as follows: Ibn Sirin said, in interpreting the vision of water coming down from the wall, that if an unmarried girl sees that the floor of the house is full of water, this is evidence of a poor choice of a good marriage and also shows her failure in emotional life. In addition, if a married woman sees water on the floor of the house, this indicates the possibility of her being exposed to major problems with her husband that may lead to divorce and separation. In general, seeing water on the floor of the house indicates the possibility of debts accumulating on the viewer, in addition to losing his job, as well as facing many major crises in his life. The interpretation of this vision can also be in a pregnant woman’s dream that she is facing problems in her pregnancy, as well as some simple fears during pregnancy and difficulty in childbirth. And if he sees that water is on the floor of his house, it is a sign of the ordeal, difficulties and problems that the seer faces in his life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about vomiting pieces of
